titles.title: Jesus is changing me, Jesus is changing me,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is changing me, Jesus is changing me,
The work of the refiner's fire;
To be as pure gold in the house of the Lord,
To bring right offerings to Him.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To Him I give all my love and praise,
With joy I draw near to Him;
The Son of Righteousness rises over me,
With healing in His wings.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Then shall the blessing of the Lord come down,
When we give all to Him,
And we shall go forth in holiness,
Delighting ourselves in God.
